newsitem.title: USA: Ramsay Health Care, Ramsay Managed Care to merge.
newsitem.headline: Ramsay Health Care, Ramsay Managed Care to merge.

text.p: Ramsay Health Care Inc and Ramsay Managed Care Inc said Wednesday they had agreed to merge and make Ramsay Managed Care a subsidiary of Ramsay Health.
The deal calls for each share of Ramsay Managed Care to be exchanged for one-third share of Ramsay Health Care, the companies said.
Each share of Ramsay Managed Care convertible preferred would be exchanged for one share of Ramsay Health Care convertible preferred, they said.

Ramsay Managed Care had about 6.4 million common shares and 100,000 shares of convertible preferred stock outstanding on September 30. Ramsay Health Care had about 8.3 million shares of common and about 142,000 shares of convertible preferred outstanding on that date, the companies said.
The companies said Ramsay Health will issue about 2.13 million common shares and 100,000 convertible preferred shares in the merger.
The companies said the merger had been approved by their boards and must be approved bny shareholders. The deal should close by the end of March 1997, they said.
Ramsay Health operates in 15 states, providing inpatient, outpatient and management services for people with behavioral problems.

Ramsay Managed runs mental health and substance abuse programs for self-insured employers, health maintenance organizations and government agencies. The company said it is pursuing the sale of its HMO division.
